snippet: A day after being cleared to swing a bat underwater in a rehabilitation pool, the Yankees’ Mark Teixeira, coming off a wrist injury, was scheduled to take swings in an indoor batting cage.
lead_paragraph: A day after being cleared to swing a bat underwater in a rehabilitation pool, the Yankees’ Mark Teixeira, coming off a wrist injury, was scheduled to take swings in an indoor batting cage.

headline.seo: Mark Teixeira of Yankees Is Swinging Bat Again
headline.main: Teixeira Is Swinging in Next Step in Recovery
headline.print_headline: Teixeira Is Swinging In Next Step In Recovery
